DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `USER_AUDIT_LOG` ;
CREATE TABLE `USER_AUDIT_LOG` ( `ID` VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, `USER_ID` VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, `ACTION_TYPE` VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, `ACTIVITY_TYPE` VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, `USER_EMAIL` VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, `TIMESTAMP` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, `ADDL_INFO` VARCHAR(250) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`), KEY `AUDIT_USER_FK` (`USER_ID`), CONSTRAINT `AUDIT_USER_FK` FOREIGN KEY (`USER_ID`) REFERENCES `USER` (`USER_ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE )ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
